message: I have a great product for you, Bob. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $140 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle at $115?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
